Name: Listen to Animals' Words: Translation of Fish's Language
Description: You meet Xuanyin again. This time, she is spying on the Tetra...
QuestDesc: You meet Xuanyin again. This time, she is spying on the Tetra...

Conditions.PreQuestName: Listen to Animals' Words: Translation of Dog's Language

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hi, {PlayerName}. Come and take a look at these Tetra. Move gently.

Options.PlotLineKey: So it's the Fish Language Translation Module this time?

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Perfect guess! Strictly speaking, it can't be called a language module. After all, fish don't have vocal organs. Their ways of speaking are diverse.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: They "speak" via grinding throat teeth, vibrating muscles, and compressing swim bladders.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: As water is much denser than air, we need to use special techniques to collect the "sounds" emitted by them.

Options.PlotLineKey: I can sense subtle vibrations in the water.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Wow, Resonators' perceptions are indeed more sensitive than us ordinary people.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: However, I've developed a technology that can help ordinary people grasp those subtle vibrations. Don't you think I'm a genius? Hehe.

Options.PlotLineKey: Only if the results are reliable and accurate.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well, you're right. Let's listen to what these Tetra are saying.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Xuanyin loads the Fish Language Translation Module onto your Pangu Terminal.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Sigh, this is a necessary sacrifice for closing in on the truth. Rest in peace. I will pay tribute to them too in the acknowledgments.

Options.PlotLineKey: Great, now you can remove my name from it.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hey, don't say that. I genuinely appreciate everyone who helped me, including animals.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: To cherish their remaining value, why don't you take it home? I heard it tastes fine...

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: As for the translation module, I didn't expect so many malfunctions occuring this time. I need to check it out carefully.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I was wondering why it didn't show any garbled text. Turns out it crashed a long time ago, haha. Alright, let me uninstall it while I'm at it.
